Detailed Description

Represents an XML Schema.

Since libxml++ 2.24:

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

xmlpp::Schema::Schema ( _xmlSchema *  schema ) [explicit]

Create a schema from the underlying libxml schema element.

xmlpp::Schema::Schema ( Document*  document = 0,
bool  embed = false 
) [explicit]

Create a schema from a XML document.

Parameters:
documentXMLSchema document, 0 to create an empty schema document.
embedIf true, the document will be deleted when the schema is deleted or another document is set.
